When a gift certificate is purchased by your buyer, then that amount is placed on hold.
A gift certificate, when redeemed, is available for withdrawal.
Payment holds are funds that belong to you that we set aside, such as security deposit. This amount is part of your total balance and will not be available for withdrawal.

A payment review hold is used to protect you against unauthorized fraud loss and for seller protection. While a transaction is on payment review hold, we recommend that you do not ship the item. We are reviewing this transaction for up to 24 hours.
A payment hold, when released, is now available for withdrawal.
A payment review hold, when released, is now available for withdrawal.
